QuestData.Title: The King's Observatory
QuestData.Description: You ought to speak to Genn. He's been locked up in his observatory ever since this ordeal started.$B$BI'm sure he's working on a plan for his people. He's a very stubborn individual.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to King Genn Greymane in the observatory inside Greymane Manor.
QuestData.RewardText: There you are, $n. I've been expecting you.$B$BI got word of your recovery and... wait -- do you feel that?
